* [[※ ACT -  Transformer CVAE动作生成器]]
* [[※ Diffusion Policy - 扩散去噪动作策略模型]]
* [[※ GenDP - 机器人操作语义几何表示]]
* [[※ OpenVLA - Vision-Language-Action Model]]
* [[Diffusion Policy - Flow Matching 对比]]
* [[Attention Is All You Need -  Transformer 开山之作 - pipeline]]

* [[KL散度对比MSE计算loss]]
